remarks: A Hilbert lattice has the exchange property.  ( ~ atexch analog.) (Contributed by NM, 15-Nov-2011.)
statement:
hlexch3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
hlexch3.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
hlexch3.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
hlexch3.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
hlexch3.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
hlexch3.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
hlexch3 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ X e. B ) /\ ( P ./\ X ) = .0. ) -> ( P .<_ ( X .\/ Q ) -> Q .<_ ( X .\/ P ) ) ) $.
